meeting_request.purpose: Need help staying in my major and understanding my weaknesses
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Lori, a second-year Psych major. I’ve taken a lot of interesting courses, but I’m not really sure what I’m good at yet. My psychology professor even acknowledged that I’m not really interested in the major, but I keep pushing myself. I’m also taking some neuroscience and language courses, but I’m not sure if those are even related to psychology. I feel like I’m falling behind, and I don’t know if I can keep doing this. I’m doing okay academically, but I’m starting to feel overwhelmed and worried about whether I’m even qualified to major in psychology. I’d love to talk to someone about how to improve my academic performance without sacrificing my passion or understanding of the field.
